result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nolen F Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerked by DN. 
Defendant Nolen F Smith in court with attorney Andrew Joseph Harrington.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

15CF582 & 15CM555

15CF582 Count 1 State requests to amend to simple posession of THC 961.41(3g)(e)  Court grants.

Defendant pleads guilty to amended count 1. 

Defendant pleads guilty to count 2 as charged.  Court questions.  Accepts plea and finds guilty.

State moves to dismiss and read in count 3 of 15CF582 and 15CM555.  Court grants.

Court relates and orders:  
Count 1 - 30 days jail with huber and good time to begin April 25th, 2016 at 4:00 p.m., with credit for 2 days and court costs, DNA sample and surcharge.
Count 2 - $811.50 forfieture with 60 days to pay, 6 months drivers license revocation, AODA.

Order to submit DNA Specimen form given to defendant.  Defendant must submit specimen when reports to jail.

Defendant Nolen F Smith in court with attorney Andrew Joseph Harrington.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF582 & 15CM555
15CF582 Not guilty pleas entered on amended information that has 3 counts.
Bail continues.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Nolen F Smith in court with attorney Andrew Joseph Harrington.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

15CF582 & 15CM555

15CF582
State relates waiver of preliminary hearing.  Court questions defendant.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing.  Court accepts waiver.
Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over.

15CM555 - Defendant pleads not guilty.  Tracks with 15CF582.  Plea hearing set for 03/16/2016 at 2 PM.  
Bond previously set.
  Arraignment scheduled for March 16, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

THIS BOND COVERS 15CF582 AND 15CM555

Clerked by AP. 
Defendant Nolen F Smith in court with attorney Ryan O'Hara (for today only).  Defendant Nolen F Smith in custody.  Angela Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF582 AND 15CM555


BOND SET TO COVER BOTH CASES.

15CF582:  Set for prelim

15CM555:  Track with 15CF582

  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 15, 2016 at 11:00 am.
